THE BANKERS INVESTMENT TRUST PLC


Portfolio Update


In accordance with Listing Rule 15.6.8 the Company discloses that as at 31 January 2022 it held the following investments in other listed closed-ended investment funds which do not have a stated investment policy to invest no more than 15% of their total assets in other listed closed-ended investment funds:


Holding % of the Company’s gross assets 3i Group 0.75
VinaCapital Vietnam 0.62
